summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Luz Brill ERP system. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), frontend mostly working with one critical issue in Ventas module.

ui_bugs.issue: Ventas page fails to render React components, shows only 'Made with Emergent' text
ui_bugs.details: All other pages load correctly, but /ventas route has JavaScript rendering issues

passed_tests: Backend API Health Check (17/17 tests passed)
Home page with 3 main buttons (Dashboard, Ventas, Delivery)
Dashboard loads with currency ticker (USD/PYG: 6681.57, BRL/PYG: 1272.68)
Dashboard statistics and charts display correctly
Sistema page with theme toggle and color selection
CRUD operations for Clientes, Productos, Stock
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Ventas page rendering issue - the React component is not loading properly on /ventas route. All other functionality is working correctly including backend APIs, login, dashboard, and sistema page with theme toggle.
